Double Punch/Injector/Manterror/Ramhorn

::Double Punch came out of his stealth mode, finally visible::

::Injector activated his com:: <Hell Beast, we have secured the control room> 


------
::Ramhorn ducked, getting scratched from a few shots, returning fire with his 
sonic shells, transforming and charging out of the ship::
